welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Odenton, where small town charm meets big city opportunities. Known for its historic sites and vibrant community, we invite you to explore and discover all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at BWI serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: This concourse serves domestic and international flights operated by Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: This concourse serves domestic and international flights operated by American Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: This concourse serves domestic and international flights operated by Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: This concourse serves domestic and international flights operated by United Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tipton AAF Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Tipton AAF Airport is dedicated to serving military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lee Airport serves all commercial flights and houses various amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lee Airport is used for private and chartered flights, offering a more personalized and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport, serving mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B/C
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the network 'DCA Free WiFi'.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Montgomery County Airport is reserved for private and charter flights only.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport terminal.
